attributes.action: bring back the right to stand (terracing) at premiership football grounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Germany they have developed 'safe standing' at major grounds like Bayern munich and it is a major success story. Poorer members and youngers members of our society are being priced out of attending football matches, it is essential to encourage younger people to get of there armchairs and physically attend football matches, otherwise the culture of attending a football match  will only exist with those that can afford it and ever increasing older members of our population.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "bring back the right to stand (terracing) at premiership football grounds."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
